article.title: Local Events - Hawaii U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about events presented by the Hawaii U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​

The U.S. Commercial Service organizes and supports conferences, seminars, and events to educate our clients and promote international trade. Our goal is to help local U.S. exporters sell globally. A sampling of our events includes:

  • Executive briefings in our office with one of our visiting Commercial Service Officers from around the world.
  • Educational export seminars and online webinars.
  • Matchmaking and export counseling services at international trade shows overseas and the U.S.


Local Trade Events

Want to sell to the Japanese? Grow your business to Canada? Crack the China market??

OAHU EXPORTS! Powering New Business Growth in 2014


Kapolei Export Seminar

Time:August 18, 2014
Date:9:00am - 11:00am
Location:University of Phoenix Kapolei Learning Center,949 Kamokila Blvd., Suite 101,Kapolei, HI 96707

Event Flyer:Click Here

Registration: Emailtammy@hawaiiexportsupport.com

Kailua Export Seminar

Date: August 19, 2014

Time:8:30am - 10:30am

Location:AB Kailua's Community Room,146 Hekili Street #202, Kailua, HI 96734

Event flyer:Click here

Registration: Emailkcoc@kailuachamber.com

North Shore Export Seminar

Date: August 20, 2014

Time: 8:30am

Location: Haleiwa Joe's,66-011 Kamehameha Highway, Haleiwa, HI 96712

Event flyer:Click here

Registration: Emailtammy@hawaiiexportsupport.com


Hawaii Kai Export Seminar

Date: August 21, 2014

Time:12:00pm - 1:30pm
Location:Outback Steakhouse,6650 Kalanianaole Hwy, Honolulu, HI 96825
Event flyer:Click here
Registration:www.hikaicoc.com​

By connecting local businesses with real international opportunities, this seminar will provide resources and contacts to those interested in pursuing business opportunities internationally.

For more information:tammy@hawaiiexportsupport.comor call 808.522.8040. Sponsored by the Kapolei Chamber of Commerce, Kailua Chamber of Commerce, North Shore Chamber of Commerce, Hawaii Kai Chamber of Commerce, the Hawaii Pacific Export Council, and the U.S. Department of Commerce – Global Markets.
